summary: A high resolution, completely lore-friendly retexture of skyrim's dragon priest masks.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]gxDT0IVpiKs[/youtube] [youtube]HxvlNhhKp2w[/youtube]


Description://///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
THis mod is a simple high resolution, lore-friendly retexture of skyrims dragonpriest masks.

In addition to replacing the games vanilla assets, this mod also adds new textures for each of the masks
respective hoods for more variety as well as a more unique and uniform look for each mask.

At present this mod only supports the games original masks and not those added by "Dragonborn" and "Dawnguard"
although I do plan on covering those eventually.


Installation://///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Installation is simple and straight forward, there is no esp. simply copy and paste the contents of the of the data
forlder too your skyrim data directory.


Bugs/Issues://///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
May conflict with any other mod which alters or replacers the dragonpriest mask asstes or properties.


Credits:////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Bethesda - For an awsome game
author: betterbecause
